item.title: How Grand Canyon Education Enhanced Their Cloud Security with CloudGuard
item.description: Educational institutions face unique challenges in maintaining robust cloud security. Grand Canyon Education (GCE) is a shared services partner dedicated to serving colleges and universities. GCE supports partner institutions’ students through operational functions that achieve organizational growth and student success. “CloudGuard Posture Management enabled us to understand our environment comprehensively, find vulnerabilities, and prioritize what was most vulnerable and the highest risk to us,” shares Michael Manrod, CISO at Grand Canyon Education. The Challenge of Cloud Visibility As Grand Canyon Education expanded its cloud computing infrastructure, they encountered a common problem: maintaining visibility across their growing cloud environment.
